problem_text: If \triangle L M N \sim \triangle Q R S, Q R = 35, R S = 37, S Q = 12, and N L = 5, find the perimeter of \triangle L M N.
compact_text: If \triangle LMN \sim \triangle QRS, QR = 35, RS = 37, SQ = 12, and NL = 5, find the perimeter of \triangle LMN.
annotat_text: If $\triangle L M N \sim \triangle Q R S, Q R=35, R S=37, S Q=12$, and $N L=5$, find the perimeter of $\triangle L M N$.
